content:
The Midland Graduate School is back from 10-14 April in Nottingham! With courses on category theory, type theory, logic and more! Including an invited course by Andrej Bauer on realisability. Book now to secure a place!
https://www.cs.nott.ac.uk/~psznk/events/mgs22.html
Please forward and repost!
Hi @Thorsten Altenkirch I heard from Andrej that you were recording the talks? Are they going to be online somewhere?
